actions.in_committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Merchant Marine.

official_title: A bill to amend the Merchant Marine Act of 1928, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Merchant Marine Act, 1928 to prohibit any vessel operated by or for the U.S. Government from being repaired, rebuilt, reconstructed, or reconditioned in a foreign shipyard, unless: (1) the work done is of an emergency nature; or (2) the foreign shipyard is operated by the U.S. Government. Directs the Secretary of the agency authorizing the emergency work in a foreign shipyard to report to the Secretary of Transportation the details of such emergency.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Merchant Marine Act of 1928, and for other purposes.
